title: Project Presentation
description:
Good times, we are presenting our amazing Event Planner App, 
such fun to make this happen, can't wait to go for holiday

title: Helsinki After Work Rooftop Meetup
description: This casual rooftop gathering invites Helsinki’s professionals and creatives to unwind, mingle, and network in a relaxed atmosphere. Held at Clarion Hotel’s rooftop bar, the event features music, drinks, and panoramic views of the city skyline. Attendees can enjoy light snacks, curated DJ sets, and interactive networking games designed to spark conversation. Whether you’re new in town, expanding your circle, or just looking for a laid-back evening, this is the perfect setting to meet like-minded people and build new connections.

title: AI & Society: Ethics in the Age of Automation
description: This one-day seminar dives deep into the ethical implications of artificial intelligence in modern society. Academics, policymakers, and industry experts will explore topics like algorithmic bias, surveillance, and the social consequences of AI decision-making. The event includes keynote talks, expert panels, and audience Q&A sessions. Open to students, researchers, and the public, it's a chance to critically engage with the future of technology and its impact on humanity.

title: Nordic Business Forum 2025
description: A premier business conference bringing together global thinkers, entrepreneurs, and executives. This year’s event in Tampere features keynote talks, workshops, and networking zones aimed at leadership, innovation, and strategic growth. Ideal for business professionals seeking to scale or adapt in a rapidly changing world.

title: Flow Festival 2025
description: Flow Festival is a leading cultural festival that combines music, design, and gastronomy. The event features an eclectic lineup from global and Nordic artists, immersive art installations, and top-tier food experiences. Held in an urban industrial area, it attracts a stylish, music-loving crowd from around the world.

title: Oulu City Run
description: Experience the northern charm of Oulu through this annual running event, offering marathon, half-marathon, and fun run options. The route takes runners through scenic urban parks, waterfront paths, and historic areas. With cheering crowds and a festive atmosphere, it's a healthy way to explore the city.

title: Wellness Weekend Kuopio
description: Explore yoga classes, mental wellness talks, plant-based cooking demos, and a sustainable living fair under one roof. A calming and enriching weekend of self-care and learning.

title: Slush 2025
description: Europe’s top startup and tech event featuring founders, VCs, and innovators. Includes keynote speeches, pitch competitions, demos, and side events throughout the city.

title: Rovaniemi Indigenous Film Festival
description: Celebrate indigenous cultures through film, discussion, and performance in Lapland's capital. Hosted at the iconic Arktikum, this festival highlights Sámi and global indigenous voices.
